verbose_text: In epithelial cells of the neural epithelium, Folr1 is thought to mediate the uptake of folic acid and trigger the activation and phosphorylation of myosin light chain kinase (MLCK) possibly through the function of Src.
evidence: Folr1 is thought to mediate the uptake of folic acid and trigger the activation and phosphorylation of myosin light chain kinase (MLCK
